column1: Little Goat Diner////Nazneen - Customer safety and comfort are our highest priority here so it's very disappointing to read about your recent visit. I sincerely apologize for the way you were treated. I can assure you that we will address this issue with the right people
column2: and I hope you consider allowing us another chance to deliver a five-star experience. If there is anything further you would like to discuss
column3: please reach out to Hunter Geye
